forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn edges toward the day in San Francisco, the cool embrace of a partly cloudy night yields to a gentle light, hinting at the sweetness of the hours to come. With the temperature dipping to a crisp 48 degrees, a light west wind both stirs the morning air and carries with it whispers of the bay. Despite the early hour, a quiet clarity envelops the landscape, allowing the bridge to rise majestically against the backdrop of a fresh blue sky that promises warmth.

As Saturday unfolds, sunshine will blanket the city, coaxing the mercury to a comfortable 64 degrees. The crispness of the morning gives way to a pleasantly invigorating day, free of the fog that often weaves its way through the city’s iconic features. The marine layer is held at bay, ushering in a visibility that makes exploring the rugged coastline and vibrant streets an inviting prospect. A light jacket in the morning will transition perfectly into a casual shirt by midday; as the sun graces the earth, those venturing outside might consider a stroll through the Presidio or a serene sit at a café, soaking in the tranquility that only San Francisco can provide. For those willing to roam, a walk along Crissy Field offers a chance to revel in the beauty of the bay with the Golden Gate standing sentinel to the north — splendid and welcoming under this brightening sky.
